overview: Once We Were Wolves follows bowhunter Cam Hanes as he returns to Alaska for the first time after the tragic death of his best friend, Roy Roth, in 2015. In honor of Roy’s memory Cam, Kip Fulks, Koby Fulks, Branlin Shockey and Johnny Rydeen embark on an epic hunting expedition for North America’s most dangerous animal.
title: Once We Were Wolves
